title: Bokusatsu Tenshi Dokuro-chan
overview:
In the future, a man named Sakura is destined to create the 
technology for eternal life, which (due to Sakura's lolicon tendencies) 
freezes all women's aging once they turn twelve. God refuses to allow 
this, so he sends his angels to the past to kill Sakura before he can do
 this. But one angel, Dokuro-chan, decides to try to change the future 
without killing him. Problem is, Dokuro is very temperamental, and is 
constantly killing Sakura (and lots of other people too) in incredibly 
bloody ways with her giant spiked club. Good thing she can bring people 
back to life - if only to grusomely kill them again the next time she 
loses her temper.
